help-file.title: DISPLAY
help-file.content:
Syntax: display (will list display options) display <option>
The "Display" command allows you to view various attributes of your character at all times. The options available are as follows:
all --displays hits/maxhits, moves/maxmoves off --turns off display hits --displays current hit points maxhits --displays maximum hit points mana --displays current mana points maxmana --displays maximum mana points slots --displays current spell slots maxslots --displays maximum spell slots moves --displays current movement points maxmoves --displays maximum movement points tankname --shows name of tank in the group tankcond --shows condition of tank in group enemy --shows name of enemy enemycond --shows condition of enemy twoline --divides display into two-line prompt
